name: UNION
description:
This is bliss, this is joy, this is you connected and at peace with the world. The Dreaming pool cards are a reflection of the human journey, the Sacred journey to who you are. For some it's a spiritual awakening, while for others it's discovering your own power. No matter which spiral of life you're on it's your life and your spiral. They are your trials and tests, your monsters and your magic helpers. It's your journey into yourself where you will discover the Universe within. Knowing who you are gives you the power to create a life that fits you perfectly. What's on the inside is reflected in the Universe without. Union is what we search for, we have it in the womb and our journey through life brings us to Union again - to be connected, aware, filled with love and in Union with all that is. We Belong, we are Held, and we are Nourished.

The Dreaming Pool Oracle is an interactive collaboration between artists Maia Mellier (@maiamellier) & AEVIN (@aevin_io)
